subject: Jennifer Wallis
mailbody:
We wish to offer you to submit application for an absolutely real home based position in logistics.


Description of job:


- The main enterprise is situated in the USA

- Doing job out of your place

- $3500 monthly payment

- Full week job



We expect you to:


- Have US citizenship

- Have USA mailing address

- Have bachelor degree or the same working experience will be plus but not necessary

- Be responsible enough to work without supervision

- Be in enough physical condition to handle items up to 25 lbs



What you will do:


- Send the parcels to the final destination, make logos and get it to the nearest delivery service.

- Repack packages if needed

- Process various parcels to your house through postal services

- Check the presence of the contents in parcels, make photos of the contents and upload them

- Receive the list of arriving packages through a special programm.



To accept this offer just respond this e-mail with your telephone number and our manager will reach you as soon as possible.

subject: Re: Jennifer Wallis
mailbody:
Dear Brother Johnson, Thank you for your mail , i am very happy that you have received a very strange custom to stone a woman for money. I have said that would send me the transfer information of the account you wish to proceed with the next step in this transaction. If it may interest you to know that I will forge your signature, but as legal practitioner we knows what to do now. I am so glad for all your help. 

 

 

 

 Shyte License Plates
